segments.text: Hey , Robert , what are you doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't have any big plans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are putting together a birthday party for Mary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like fun . Where will it be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We thought it would be fun to have a pool party at Jay's house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh good ! Can I bring anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will be providing hot dogs , hamburgers , and cake , but people can bring side dishes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am assuming that the dress is casual .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dress casually and bring your bathing suit !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful . Just e-mail me the time and date and I'll be there .
segments.speaker: S2
